pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the President of the United States of America, Donald Trump | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with the President of the United States of America, Donald Trump.

The Prime Minister wished both the President and First Lady well following their recent COVID-19 diagnosis. The Prime Minister also recalled the President’s expressions of concern for Sophie Grégoire Trudeau’s health after her COVID-19 diagnosis last March.

The two leaders discussed the ongoing efforts to manage the pandemic and keep citizens in both countries safe.

The Prime Minister also thanked the President for the ongoing support of the United States in seeking the immediate release of the two Canadian citizens arbitrarily detained by China.

The President and Prime Minister agreed to stay in close contact.
